targets.expr: max(avg(label_replace(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{job="postgresql",instance=~"(de1|gb1|gb4|gb5).+"}[5m]) * 10000, "datacentre", "$1", "instance", "^([^-]+)-.*$")) by (datacentre, cluster)) by (datacentre) + stddev(avg(label_replace(rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{job="postgresql",instance=~"(de1|gb1|gb4|gb5).+"}[5m]) * 10000, "datacentre", "$1", "instance", "^([^-]+)-.*$")) by (datacentre, cluster)) by (datacentre)
